CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 20, 1961, pg. 2 reads: "Loser - Erroll Davis, 13th Ward independent Democratic aldermanic candidate, who ran as a team with Clarence (Larry) Huff, labor leader, was defeated by the voters."
TitMainTitle: Erroll Davis and unknown woman standing in front of campaign poster for Alderman Erroll B. Davis and Constable Clarence "Larry" Huff Democratic Candidates for the 13th Ward, during 1961 primary elections
